document_data.name: Iftuu
document_data.text: ''"Hey, now," the battlerager asked, "is yourself Bruenor's pet drow?".''
document_data.mainbody:
In [[1357 DR]], [[Jarlaxle]] and his [[Bregan D'aerthe]] helped Vierna Do'Urden track down Drizzt with the aid of [[Artemis Entreri]].

===Death===
While on lookout for enemies, Iftuu encountered [[Thibbledorf Pwent]] who took a second to decide if the drow was actually Drizzt.

History.Death: While on lookout for enemies, Iftuu encountered [[Thibbledorf Pwent]] who took a second to decide if the drow was actually Drizzt.
